==In this page you have three tabs: ==

In My Projects you can see all the projects in which you are a member.

In New Projects you can see all the new projects except the ones which are private.

In AllProjects you can see all the projects except the ones which are private.

==In the left of the screen there are two lists:==

In My Upcoming Tasks you see the 5 tasks that that were most recently created.

In My Upcoming Milestones you see the 5 milestones that were most recently created.
